body.p: Capt. Thos W Gibson, one of our leading lawyers, desires a commission of Notary. Public. He is eminently worth of it. May I ask that you will give it to him

I have the honor to be,
very res,
Yr Obt Sevt,
Hamilton Pope

Jefferson Co
Notary Public
Thos W. Gibson
apptd.
7th July/64
